```{python}
#| title: "Some Phylopic example"
#| echo: true
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Show the code"

import polars as pl
from pylifemap import Lifemap

# Load iucn dataset
iucn = pl.read_parquet(
    "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Lifemap-ToL/pylifemap/main/data/iucn.parquet"
)

Lifemap(iucn, taxid_col="taxid", width="100%").layer_points(fill="status").show()
```
